description: This table extracts all the A&P note IDs associated with a problem.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of this Problem List entry.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LPL_VISIT_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The ID of the visit note associated with this problem.
